arabic.title: محدش يحاسبني
text: عادى ماهى دى حياتى وحرة فيها
Aadi ma hi di hayati we horra beeha
we elli yelomni fi youm aleiha

english.title: Don't blame me
text: I want to see the world in my eyes
I want to see the world in my eyes
That's it, the world is opening its door to me
I lost much time in vain
That's it, it's my life and I'm free
and who blames me in one day
this world is just a game
I either win or lose it
I see this game very easy
this world is just a game
I either win or lose it
I see this game very easy
That's it, the world is opening its door to me
I lost much time in vain
That's it, it's my life and I'm free
and who blames me in one day

english.title: the most beautiful place
text: he told me "I love you" and the weird thing is that he only knew me two days ago
is this daring or goodness or lover's madness
he held my hands and said see what you are doing to my heart
I remained silent of shyness I couldn't say a word
peace , peace , this is beyond dreams my lovers is changing my life
peace peace he took my heart with him and I'm going to live with him all the long nights
I was lost in his eyes for a few seconds and I stole a moment from the years
he took me away and i came back again he laughed and told me " were did you go"
I had to run from my silence and I said " I won't lie to you
the most beautiful place i have gone to were his eyes
peace , peace , this is beyond dreams my lovers is changing my life
peace peace he took my heart with him and I'm going to live with him all the long nights
I felt with him things that my heart never felt before, the moment I met him I forgot everything I've felt before

arabic.title: أحلام بريئة
text: وكنت بجد مش عاملة حساب يوم للسنين

english.title: Innocent Dreams
text: I still remember the days of childhood
Days that I will never forget so easily
nor can I forget this smile1
and the words of his eyes were calling me
and I ran to him and hugged his hand
We built palaces in the sand
we pranked each other a 100 times
And I really was not prepared for the years
And in a day and a night
Days that were long years ago
I left in them sweet memories
Going back is an impossible thing
And I dream of seeing him even once one day
And if he saw me by chance one day
Surely his heart will know me
and he will steal me from the world with his eyes

english.title: Your many names
text: My heart that gives me life
And do not say, my livelihood
Tell me my love and cheat me
Can you my  love  forgive me
You just make me forget who im

arabic.title: أكتبلك تعهد
text: ممكن تسيبني اشتري عمري اللي باقي؟
و انت لو مبقتش بتصدق كلامي
حتى لو كل اللي باقي منها صوت
من غير ما يجي الموت هموت

english.title: I'd Write You a Pledge
text: Will you let me…buy the rest of my life?
I don't want to live it with you
because if I lived whole of it with wounds
And if you're scared that when you leave me
I'll meet after you someone shields me
and if you no longer believe my words
I could write you a pledge
saying that I will live the rest of my life alone
as long as I living it respectfully
Even if what remains from her is just a voice
If I continue my life with you,
without death coming, I would still die
There is no longer a place in my heart for you nor
I no longer want many things,
All I want is to live
And if you're scared that when you leave me
I'll meet after you someone shields me
and if you no longer believe my words
I could write you a pledge
saying that I will live the rest of my life alone
as long as I living it respectfully

english.title: I'd Write You a Pledge
text: Will you let me buy the rest of my life?
I don't want to live it with you
because if I live a life full of wounds then
And if you're scared that when you leave me
I'll find someone to value1 me after you are gone
and if you no longer believe my words
I can write you a pledge
saying that I will live the rest of my life alone
as long as I live it keeping my respect
Even if what remains from her is just a voice
If I continue my life with you,
without death coming, I would still die
There is no longer a place in my heart for you nor
I no longer want many things,
All I want is to live
And if you're scared that when you leave me
I'll find someone to value1 me after you are gone
and if you no longer believe my words
I can write you a pledge
saying that I will live the rest of my life alone
as long as I live it keeping my respect

arabic.title: اتجاه واحد
text: كان في ساعات بتكون جنبي يا حبيبي
بس دلوقتي القرار في اتجاه واحد
روح وغيب انت مش نافع حبيب

english.title: One-way
text: Why didn't you tell me from the beginning
that there was someone in your life before me?
When you still miss her sometimes
why were you getting closer to me then?
It's a page, and before closing it
And now there is nothing we can do
we have reached the end of the road
Back then I had the option of making a choice
and I will leave you because you are a liar
You're not fit to be a lover
There were times you were by my side, oh love
I felt that since early on
but I was stubborn and called my heart a liar
And when we met her by chance
I saw a look in your eyes
you probably never looked at me like that
in our life, not even once
Back then I had the option of making a choice
and I will leave you because you are a liar
You're not fit to be a lover

arabic.title: الأمل
text: و مفيش حياه من غير أمل
و مفيش أمل من غير حياة

english.title: Hope
text: There is no life without hope
There is no hope without life
You could say that life... life is hope
Everyday a beautiful life begins and carries us to the clouds
We touch hope and find it's a mirage
We dream and the stars make promises to us
We sleep and we wake up to the same mirage
Walking like this while there is no path
What can we do except hope?

arabic.title: الحروف
text: هى يعنى الدنيا من غير حب تسوى؟
ولا يعنى الدنيا من غير حب تسوى؟
فين و إمتى ما كنت عارفة
هى يعنى الدنيا من غير حب تسوى؟
ولا يعنى الدنيا من غير حب تسوى؟

english.title: The Letters
text: The letters coming from your lips.. The sweetest song
I've been dreaming my whole life.. Of a sweet word
A word which has both meaning and feeling
What is life worth without love?
Or what is life worth without love?
I've been dreaming of meeting you.. where and when.. I didn't know
I've been laughing.. but with fear inside me
And when my eyes saw you.. I said "now I see"
What is life worth without love?
Or what is life worth without love?

english.title: The Letters
text: The letters that come from between your lips
I was dreaming throughout my life
A word with feeling and meaning together
What is the world worth without love?
What is the world worth without love?
I was dreaming of meeting you
Where and when I didn't know
I was living my life laughing but scared inside
As soon as my eyes saw you I said now I see
What is the world worth without love?
What is the world worth without love?
The letters that come from between your lips
I was dreaming throughout my life
A word with feeling and meaning together
What is the world worth without love?
What is the world worth without love?

arabic.title: انا ساندة عليك
text: انا قبل ما اقابلك ياما قسيت
انا كنت وحيده وعايشه في غربه

english.title: I am supporting on you
text: There is a place in my heart was never open to anyone except you
Things happened to me that I never had before you
I stopped to feel fear, and I am not afraid of future anymore
And if I feel afraid, I am just afraid for you, my love
If life, one day, was tough on me, I seek protection from you
In extreme cold, I feel warm by looking into your eyes
O my love, sometimes I feel lonely, and I need you
Before I call you, once I open my eyes, I find you in front of me
I won't lie, I suffered a lot before I met you
I was lost for years, and I went everywhere
I was lonely, living in foreignness and never relaxed
When I found you, I found support, heart and home
If life, one day, was tough on me, I seek protection from you
in extreme cold, I feel warm by looking into your eyes
O my love, sometimes I feel lonely, and I need you
Before I call you, once I open my eyes, I find you in front of me

english.title: There She Comes
text: The one in whose eyes he stayed,
and the one in whose eyes he spent the nights,
the one in whose love he lived,
and the one whom he died for
He says he has forgotten her eyes
And his eyes say he wants her1
It shows that he is dying for her
He's occupied with her and [ignores] my heart
I will be patient and let her
live her days and after that
I will occupy the mind that is occupied with her
I will let it go, I will let it go
Tomorrow my shade will overshadow her
He says he has forgotten her eyes
And his eyes say he wants her1
It shows that he is dying for her
The one in whose eyes he stayed,
and the one in whose eyes he spent the nights,
the one in whose love he lived,
and the one whom he died for
He says he has forgotten her eyes
And his eyes say he wants her1
It shows that he is dying for her

arabic.title: بحب اغنى
text: صوت الندى لو لمس خد الورود مغنى
ده كل حد فينا جواه في تكوينه
صوت الندى لو لمس خد الورود مغنى

english.title: I love to Sing
text: When the moon stays up in your arms,
and when I see you, oh Nile
I stay up thinking of the past
At the time of pain and happiness
The sound of the birds, the birds
Over the trees is a song
The sound of the sea and the air,
The sound of the rain is a song
The sound of the dew as it touches the flowers' cheeks,
the flowers' cheeks, is a song
The entire life is a hummed song
leave behind a lot of memories
Even crying is a sad flute
And in our wounds there's a song
And in our happiness there's a song
a violin that plays a [tune of] pain
And he who did not fall in love with singing1
nor touch it with his soul
The sound of the birds, the birds
Over the trees is a song
The sound of the sea and the air,
The sound of the rain is a song
The sound of the dew as it touches the flowers' cheeks,
the flowers' cheeks, is a song
The entire life is a hummed song
leave behind a lot of memories
Even crying is a sad flute
And in our wounds there's a song
And in our happiness there's a song
When the moon stays up in your arms,
and when I see you, oh Nile
At the time of pain and happiness

arabic.title: بحب نفسي
text: كل لما اشوفه والقى عنيا قصاد عنيه
ويقول ليالي كتير بقاسي في البعاد
ما دام حيرجع .. كان ليه بيبعد

english.title: I love myself
text: Why would he come back to me ?
Of course because he misses my whispers
He hears my voice .. even in my silence
He hears me properly .. and in my absence
He kills everything inside of me
And here he comes again .. regretting leaving me
and telling me how much he suffers in my absence
and wants me to come back to him
would he go away for so long ?
As long as he'd come back.. why did he leave ?
I already knew why he came back to me
that he wouldn't be okay in my absence ?
He couldn't live alone even for a night
and also I feel him close in his absence

english.title: I love you, I miss you
text: I love you, I miss you
And you have a lot of things to say to me
Because my heart is trying to satisfy you
And you don't let your love show the way
Maybe sometimes you miss some things
That are very simple and easy
But I get very angry at you forget them
Don't forget to speak I beg you
For the sake of everyone that loves you
My eyes, my heart, and my years
Help me and say it please
I'll find for you the things I have
And tell them to my heart

arabic.title: بخاف أفرح
text: وأنا الوردة اللي دبلت قبل ما تفتح
حياة و اللي اتعود عليها بقى
وأنا الصورة اللي مكسورة في بروازها

english.title: I am afraid to rejoice
text: I feel like I have no place
And I become always afraid to rejoice
How would a complaining helps a broken heart
I'm the rose which withered before it bloomed
Life and i gave up for it years ago
And I have to continue it
Life and who got used of it
Will not be surprised by the problems
I'm that broken picture in the frame

english.title: what should i say to you
text: what am i saying to you .. don't leave far away
what should i say to you .. if you go away
don't go away .. sadness is really far
and i say why do you stay with me .. and you go away
and what to say to you
if we have any days in our lives far from each other , we don't need them
we've lost to much in our suffering
and in some illusions  , which we never benefited from,
without an old wound on a new wound
and what to say to you
what should we fear , if our love is inside of us
and if it is written for our hearts to melt down , let them melt when we meet,
we don't need more expatriation or any more Sighs, and what to tell you,
what am i saying to you .. don't leave far away
what should i say to you .. if you go away
don't go away .. sadness is really far
and i say why do you stay with me .. and you go away

arabic.title: بقيت وحدك
text: و بان أكتر صهيل البرد حواليا
و مش بايديك تكون ملكي ولا ليا
لكن احلامنا مش وحديها في الدنيا
ما يمكن نجمك الأحلى في حاجات جاية

english.title: You Became Alone
text: The real journey of isolation started
and the neighing of the cold became more apparent round me (2x)
It's not in your hands to belong to me or be mine
nor is it in my hands to return to you
but this is the rest of the story
All this was not my intention
nor your dream, nor your intention
But our dreams are not alone in the world
maybe your sweetest star is coming in other things
and maybe i'll find that my sadness is imagined
will we be able or not,
I'm not scared; don't be scared
You too should take a look at yourself
Many people found that their fears are imagined
It's not in your hands to belong to me or be mine
nor is it in my hands to return to you
Goodbye, oh the most precious thing I leave
I have said goodbye to my lover

english.title: I Hate Music
text: I hate music that reminds me of you
that brings me back to your love
it takes me and returns me,
get torn down, get torn down
Our drowning story is suffocating me
And the truth is, I'm tired, tired
of your scent, of your mention
get torn down, get torn down

arabic.title: بين البينين
text: و انا مش حمل جرح جديد
و اشوف صورتك في عين الناس
و اموت يا حبيبي م الغيرة
انا مش عارفة انا اعمل ايه
و يوم عن يوم جراحي تزيد
تعبت خلاص من اللي انا فيه

english.title: Between Two Extremes
text: I'm in love and I don't say it
I'm scared of your cruel heart
and I fear my feelings deceiving me
And I wouldn't bear a new wound
And I see your image in peoples' eyes
and I die of jealousy, darling
Should I get closer or go far away?
and I am between two extremes
Neither am I close nor far
Nor do my day's eyes seem to appear1
I wish I had an alternative for my heart
and not to make me forget
and in my moment of weakness, he doesn't leave me
The happiness that I do not live,
I do not touch in my days,
I barely see it only in my dreams
I die and I'm supposedly alive
and I am between two extremes
Neither am I close nor far
Nor do my day's eyes seem to appear1
And I say I'll forget you to set myself at peace
I don't know what to do
And day after day my wounds increase
And my longing grows inside of me
Have mercy on me, that's enough
I'm tired of what is happening to me
and I am between two extremes
Neither am I close nor far
Nor do my day's eyes seem to appear1

arabic.title: جنبك مكانى
text: أول مرة اقول انا نفسي اعيش مع حد

english.title: My Place is by Your Side
text: It is the first time I say I want to live with someone
and for the first time I say it for real
when I have [already] seen the answer
I wish to live with you
My place is by your side
I got used to living by myself
But I found myself not calculating1
I wish to live with you
My place is by your side

english.title: Very special situation
text: You and I are a very special case
A case that does not exist.
And there isn't in our life
When you are with me, I feel like a child
My life is like a party, my love
And I close all the doors to sadness
It sent me out of my mind
I came into the world to love you
And melt my heart into yours
You and I are an extraordinary case
And our minds are the same
There is nothing conventional between us
You know what the festivity and celebration are?

arabic.title: حتة ناقصة
text: مشكلتي انك حاجة اكبر من حبيبي
من امتى يعني في الدنيا دي حاجة كاملة؟
بعدين يا سيدي قصادنا عمر بحاله لسه
مشكلتي انك حاجة اكبر من حبيبي

english.title: A Missing Part
text: and what I feel is something else
When you get tired, I get tired1
When you get happy, I get happy
Oh love, right away in a second
You are my soul, when you leave me for a second
My problem is that you are something more than a lover
But I feel that you are
If I feel that there is
Since when was anything in this world perfect?
I don't deny that you treat me in the best way possible
Anyways fella, the entire life is still ahead of us
and what I feel is something else
When you get tired, I get tired1
When you get happy, I get happy
Oh love, right away in a second
You are my soul, when you leave me for a second
My problem is that you are something more than a lover
But I feel that you are

arabic.title: سيدي وصالك
text: دا أنت النسايم اللي بيها العمر حالي
امتى يا سيدي تحس بيه تروف بحالي؟
آه من بعادك طال وليه راضي يا ضي عيني؟
راح فين ودادك؟ ليه عز التلاقي بينك وبيني
سيدي وصالك فين؟ قلبك لغيري والا انت شاري؟
سيدي مناها العين تحيا بقربي ليلي ونهاري

english.title: My Mister, your closeness / (*Sidi, **Wesal)
text: My Mister your closeness, deepened my longing for you
Your subtlety provoked more passion, but you're overlooking me
You are the breezes that sweeten my life
When will you notice me, show me compassion/(feel how I feel)?
Oh, your distance, took far too long, why? Light of my eye
Where's your affection for me, when we meet? Why?
My Mister, why so far? Is your heart someone else’s, or is it mine?
My eyes wish for nothing more than you being close to me day and night

* Sidi/Sayedi; Literal; My Mister/Master, could also be my King/Ruler/Prince, depending on the context. Used to address a gentleman that earned your loyalty or love or respect. Also occasionally a classic/traditional/polite term of endearment. A subtle "My Love" in this song.

** Wisal/Wesal; Nearness/Closeness. An Arabic poetic word, describing connecting with someone because you appreciate them. Fulfilling ones eagerness to be around a loved one. The act of approaching the one you long to be with, varying in meaning from family, to a romantic interest; the case in this song.

english.title: give me your heart !!
text: ooh Mr.(man) , please give me the Joints of your heart because  your love is so hard for me .
the way of interesting of me , make me so passion however you forget me !!! .
you are The breezes which Make me live .
tell me When will you feel my love to Mercy my torment ?
ooh , your Absence is so long , why are you doing that (who is the light of my eyes ) ?
where is your cute ? why it's to hard the meeting between us ?
ooh Mr.(man) , tell me where are the Joints of your heart , are you give your heart (love) to another women or u still love me ?
ooh Mr.(man) , my eyes want to live next to you all my night and my day .

arabic.title: ضي عنيك
text: دا أنا عمري اللي كان قبلك

english.title: The light of your eyes
text: My emotions and all my feelings, they took me to you
I became more closer to myself, and I adore you
Baby, life's laughing to me with the light of your Eyes
My life before you, I haven't lived
My emotions and all my feelings, they took me to you
I became more closer to myself, and I adore you
Baby, life's laughing to me with the light of your Eyes
My life before you, I haven't lived
My time, my love, when I'm next to you I don't count
And my life passes either next to you or else I don't need it
With you I feel things I've never felt
My time, my love, when I'm next to you I don't count
And my life passes either next to you or else I don't need it
With you I feel things I've never felt
Baby I love you such love , words can't describe
And the peace of my heart I've found it in the best love
The joy of my life, I have all the dreams
My life before you, I haven't lived
My time, my love, when I'm next to you I don't count
And my life passes either next to you or else I don't need it
With you I feel things I've never felt
My time, my love, when I'm next to you I don't count
And my life passes either next to you or else I don't need it
With you I feel things I've never felt
My emotions and all my feelings, they took me to you
Baby, life's laughing to me with the light of your Eyes
My life before you, I haven't lived

arabic.title: طول مانت بعيد
text: بس المرادي أكيد هتحس بفرق كبير
واللي انا شيلته و خبيته ف قلبي
و بحس ان انت ضروري حصلك حاجة
أول ما اداويك تبعد و تروح
و بحس ان انت ضروري حصلك حاجة
أول ما اداويك تبعد و تروح

english.title: As Long as You're Far
text: I feel assured that you are fine
But this time surely you'll sense a big difference
And what I held and hit in my heart
I know what happened to you
and I feel something [wrong] must have happened to you
I don't even ask how are you
Immediately I ask: what is wrong with you?
Once I cure you, you go away and leave
I feel assured that you are fine
I feel I'm dying because of my fear for you
I wished in my times of weakness
to talk to you and tell you about it
How is it that my heart, in your absence,
and in the day that I need you by my side
I know what happened to you
and I feel something [wrong] must have happened to you
I don't even ask how are you
Immediately I ask: what is wrong with you?
Once I cure you, you go away and leave
I feel assured that you are fine

arabic.title: عرفها بيا
text: و انك ملكت الكون والدنيا ديا
و ان استحاله تكون غير بس ليا
ان الى جاي في حياتك لعيونها هي

english.title: Introduce me to her
text: Why did you drop silent all of a sudden? Tell her about what's between us, what's between us!
The story of our infatuation and our love, why are you hiding it, why are you hiding it?
Introduce me to her, either answer me
or let me tell her the story and let her be witness
Deny my existence, swear to her, that what's between us is over
Lie to her and tell her that you've dedicated to her alone what's to come of your life
That it is her laughter that alleviates what ails you
Introduce me to her, either answer me
or let me tell her the story and let her be witness
Tell her what you told me when you so brazenly lied to my face, detailing
how you really feel a connexion with me
that you feel like the universe and what's in it is all yours
and that it's impossible that you'll ever be anybody else's.

english.title: My Life is with You
text: I have waited for the chance to come
So that I can speak to you
Speak to you and tell you of what's in my heart
which is in love with you
You are the world and the loveliest of what's in it
The kindness of your heart sweetens it
You are the happiness that I live with
Oh your eyes are my tales
Take me so that I can live for you
Can you see, darling, can you?
Can you hear the whispers of [my] lips
and the words of my heart that is scared
to tell anyone else of his love?
My heart has wished for so long
And I kept telling it to wait
Tomorrow we will live in bliss as days go by

arabic.title: فاكراك
text: انا حبي لك اكبر من جرحك
انا حبي لك اكبر من جرحك

english.title: I remember you
text: I remember you, I remember you
I'm hurt and I forgive you
I remember you, I remember you
And also I never lie to you
My love for you is bigger than your hurt
And thus I'm not forgetting you
And I say to myself don't try to forget
And I said your being far away I wish would harden
And I returned to longing again
And it's still between me and myself

arabic.title: فنجان النسيان
text: و اهرب وحدي في أي مكان
بلاش توجع حبيب في الكون ميتكررش
و اهرب وحدي في أي مكان
و اهرب وحدي في أي مكان

english.title: The Cup of Forgetfulness
text: The best period of my life
the tape of the sadness winds
and I return with your love to the past
Your absence tortured1 me for years
And when I remember what was
And I run away alone to any place
I breathe the rain of longing
and drink the cup of forgetfulness
Don't hurt a lover who is one of a kind in the world
It would be a shame if you prevent love from returning,
It would be a shame if we do not go on
the tape of the sadness winds
and I return with your love to the past
Your absence tortured1 me for years
And when I remember what was
And I run away alone to any place
I breathe the rain of longing
and drink the cup of forgetfulness
And what would stop us, surely we can
avoid deepening the wounds of our separation
the tape of the sadness winds
and I return with your love to the past
Your absence tortured1 me for years
And when I remember what was
And I run away alone to any place
I breathe the rain of longing
and drink the cup of forgetfulness

arabic.title: قلبك
text: من المستحيل انك تبعد حبيب عنك
حبيب لقى منك كل اللي يتمناه

english.title: Your Heart
text: (Your heart is not yours anymore .. as long as I love you
Your heart is not yours anymore .. as long as I live in you .. as long as I love you .. It has become my heart
Your heart is no longer with you .. is no longer yours
Your heart is no longer with you .. as long as I feel you
I took it and I took you with me) x2
(It's impossible to get away a lover from you
A lover found in you everything he wishes for
It's impossible to escape, relax and come closer
The one who loves you doesn't know the word "no") x2
Your heart is not yours anymore .. as long as I love you
Your heart is not yours anymore .. as long as I live in you .. as long as I love you .. It has become my heart
(Your heart has become a part of me, accept it and agree with me
inside of you you hear me .. and what prevents us from living our lives and our love
..You're alone and I'm alone .. your time and my time get passing
You want me and I want you .. then why are we wasting our lives?) x2
It's impossible to get away a lover from you
A lover found in you everything he wishes for
It's impossible to escape, relax and come closer
The one who loves you doesn't know the word "no"
Your heart is not yours anymore .. as long as I love you
Your heart is not yours anymore .. as long as I live in you .. as long as I love you .. It has become my heart
(It's impossible to get away a lover from you
A lover found in you everything he wishes for
It's impossible to escape, relax and come closer
The one who loves you doesn't know the word "no") x2

arabic.title: لا تهچى
text: لا تهچى في كفوفي مو مهم راي الكفوف
دربنا واحد ولو ما يلتقي خطيننا
مو على كيف الزمان ولا على كيف الظروف
لعن ابو حي الظروف اللي بتوقف بيننا
كلنا قبل نتلاقي حالنا حال الضعوف
كلنا كنا ترانا تايهيين في ليلنا
في دخولك في حياتي انت سويت معروف
خلنا نحيا حياة تليق في شخصيننا
مستحيل اني ابيعك لو على حد السيوف
لا تفاول بالنهايه باكر نعيش ونشوف
إما زان الحظ ولا ربنا بيعيننا

english.title: Don't read
text: Don't read my palms.. Palm reading doesn't matter
Our way is one even if our lines don't meet
Damned the circumstances that stand between us
All of us before we meet our situations  are vulnerables
In your entry into my life you did me a favour
Leave us to live a life that is worthy of our personalities
No way I am selling you even if under the edge of swords
Till the end of my life we will share our lives
Don't think of  bad omen at the end .. Tomorrow we will live and see
Either our luck gets better or God help us.

english.title: Why on earth have you walked out on her?
text: Why on earth have you walked out on her?
Why on earth have you given her hard time?
Isn't she the woman of your dreams
You just tend to be unfaithful so easily.
She was the one after your own heart, just the one for you.
Do you really want to leave and forget her?
She is the single good person left for you.
Do those who give just get dumped?
And take nothing from love but agony?
They have to regret its days
So they get blamed for being in love.

english.title: Why did you leave her
text: Isn't this the one your imagination adored?
What happened to you? ditch people and cheat
Isn't this the one your imagination adored?
What happened to you? ditch people and cheat
Your heart chose her and she suits you
She sees what comes into your mind
Your heart chose her and she suits you
She sees what comes into your mind
You want to let her away from you and forget her
She is the only nice thing left for you
Do those who give are left?
and only gain pain out of love?
Do those who give are left?
and only gain pain out of love?
Because they love, they are blamed
Isn't this the one your imagination adored?
What happened to you? ditch people and cheat
Isn't this the one your imagination adored?
What happened to you? ditch people and cheat

arabic.title: ما بتعلمش
text: و سهرانة فى هواه ما بنامش
و سهرانة فى هواه ما بنامش

english.title: I will never learn
text: I Will never learn. My heart only dreams of him
The night sleep while I am awake. Because of his love I can't sleep
He goes, absent and forget me . When he comes to me again..
My heart heart forgive him in a second as if it was never hurt
Why I forgive and my heart is satisfied with the least
He takes from me and I give.... My heart is not a miser in his love
I Will never learn. My heart only dreams of him
The night sleep while I am awake. Because of his love I can't sleep
He goes, absent and forget me . When he comes to me again..
My heart heart forgive him in a second as if it was never hurt
Why my days go by  swiftly..?
His love is all what I dream of ....Why are all my dreams incomplete ?
I Will never learn. My heart only dreams of him
The night sleeps while I am awake. Because of his love I can't sleep
He goes, absent and forget me . When he comes to me again..
My heart heart forgive him in a second as if it was never hurt

english.title: He didn't mention me
text: He didn't mention me, he didn't say anything, he didn't feel like telling me something
And love or not, he still didn't think it's easy to forget
He asked about me, he asked about me, with what? with what?
He asked about me with his words? Or with his eyes?
But beware if you have told him I asked about him
You're scared to tell I might miss and yearn for him
What's between us? All what is between us is separation
Maybe in a day or two
Maybe with an eye look we'll be back to just two lovers that nothing happened between them
And he asked about me, he asked about me
He asked about me with his words? Or with his eyes?
But beware if you have told him I asked about him
And if he didn't love after me say the truth and tell me
And if he did just forget and don't, don't you dare tell me
There's still a lot of things that it's not in the past anymore
My longing is feeling that its lap is still empty
He asked about me with his words? Or with his eyes?
But beware if you have told him I asked about him

english.title: I'm confused
text: Yes i love you so much
I don't stand the sight of you
I'm confused because of your love
i feel like i'm not ok
and i come closer to you
and i feel scared and jealous
i see you as an angel
and i see all your faults
i see that life is beautiful

english.title: Confused
text: Yes, I love you very much
I'm confused, out of my love for you
I'm sure of my love for you
That's why I push you away
But I come closer tou you
But more I feel afraid and jelous
I see you as an angel
But I see your many faults as well
As long as I see you fine

arabic.title: مصر قريبة
text: في مصر الحضن اللي عاش يكسر بينا الحدود
مسير الغايب يعود وتلمس ايده الحيطان
مصر قريبة واوام يدوب جواها الغريب
ما بالك وانت القريب اخويا وصاحب مكان
وانت ماشي في مصر شايف 1000 ضحكة بتناديك
وانت ماشي في مصر عارف انها فرحانة بيك
قولي فين الغربة وانت وسط اهلك مش بعيد
ده الفرح لو زار ديارك يلقى جوه ديارنا عيد
سلمى يا سلامة روحنا وجينا بالسلامة
سلمي يا سلامة روحنا وجينا بالسلامة
نهار وليل مصر صاحية تبارك فينا النوم
تقابل ناس بالمحبة تزيد الشوق يدوم
فى مصر تقول 100 صباح الفل عليك حبيبى ياغالى
لسان الناس بالكلام الحلو ينقط سكر
فيها حاضر فيها طيب فيها يتلاقوا الأحبة
وبين قلوب الناس تطيب نهار وليل مصر صاحية تبارك فينا النوم
وانت ماشي في مصر شايف 1000 ضحكة بتناديك
وانت ماشي في مصر عارف انها فرحانة بيك
سلمى يا سلامة روحنا وجينا بالسلامة
سلمى يا سلامة روحنا وجينا بالسلامة
بلاد الخير شايلة ضيوفها فوق الرآس
يا مرحب بيك قد القول واجدع ناس
تعالى اقعد منور هاتله واحد شاي
ولازم تشرب كلمة في نكته ده احنا بقينا عشرة خلاص
ابدأ منين من العشق من عن هواها يستغنى
وفي الجميل توصف كرمها كأنها الجنة
جامعة الحبايب والجيران مفيهاش غريب عني
اسهر يا ليل غني يا عين قسم وسلطني
مصر قريبة واوام يدوب جواها الغريب
ما بالك وانت القريب اخويا وصاحب مكان
آمان وسلام ما نعرف خصام طريق المحبة جميل
في مصر تشوف تاريخ حكاوي الزمان
وقعدة في درب النيل تنسيك هموم الدنيا
تصفي القلوب وتبوح صديقة وحبيبة وصادقة
واجمل كيان و روح شوف نفس الملامح والوجوه
العقل يحتار و يتوه والعين ما تقدر تفرق ابداً مابين عربي واخوه
آمان وسلام ما نعرف خصام طريق المحبة جميل
في مصر الحضن اللي عاش يكسر بينا الحدود
مسير الغايب يعود وتلمس ايده الحيطان
وانت ماشي في مصر شايف الف ضحكة بتناديك
وانت ماشي في مصر عارف انها فرحانة فيك
في مصر .. كل الوشوش تعرفها ..مصر قريبة

english.title: Egypt's close
text: in Egypt, there's the lap which lived for smashing the borders between us
the absent necessarily will come back & his hands'll touch the walls
Egypt is close and the stranger feels affinity in it
while you are the relative, brother and place owner
and you're walking in Egypt, you're watching thousand smiles are calling you
and you're walking in Egypt, you know its people're happy with you
tell me where the foreignness is! while you're among your family
if the happiness visits your home, it'll find a feast in our home
it'll find a hand in the distress time
Salma ya Salama, we went and came back safely
Salma ya Salama, we went and came back safely
morning & night, Egypt is awake blessing our sleep
you meet people by love increase & longing lasting
in Egypt, you say 100 good morning my sweetheart buddy
people's talks involve by sweetie & sugary words
it's got attendants & got blessings & lovers are meeting there
and it reconciles the hearts..morning & night, Egypt is awake blessing our sleep
and you're walking in Egypt, you're watching thousand smiles are calling you
and you're walking in Egypt, you know its people're happy with you
Salma ya Salama, we went and came back safely
Salma ya Salama, we went and came back safely
the blessed country honors its visitors
welcome with you, they commits their words & they're noble people
come on , have a seat, bring him a tea
and you must drink, by talks & jokes, we became buddies surely
where can I start! from the the love, who can live without its love (Egypt)!
and about courtesy, its generosity makes it be described as the paradise
gathers the lovers & neighbors, it hasn't any stranger for me
stay awake night, hey eye, sing, let me enjoy
Egypt is close and the stranger feels affinity in it
while you are the relative, brother and place owner
it's safe & peaceful, we don't witness quarrel, it's a beautiful track of love
in Egypt, you watch history, old time talks
and a sit nearby the Nile where forgets you the troubles of life
purifies the hearts and lets it tell, it's a friend , lover and honest
and the prettiest entity & spirit .. look .. the same faces & lineaments
it makes the mind be lost & puzzled, and the eyes can never distinguish between Arabian & their brother
it's safe & peaceful, we don't witness quarrel, it's a beautiful track of love
in Egypt, there's the lap which lived for smashing the borders between us
the absent necessarily will come back & his hands'll touch the walls
and you're walking in Egypt, you're watching a thousand smiles are calling you
and you're walking in Egypt, you know its people're happy with you
Egypt is close & happy with you
"In Egypt .. All the faces know it .. Egypt is close"

arabic.title: مطمنة
text: مش عايزة منك إثباتات و مصدقاك
في كل حالة من الحالات هافضل معاك
مصدقة اللي عملته ليا واللي لسه هتعمله
مصدقة خوفك عليا اللي مش بتمثله
وعشان كده لو يحصل إيه مطمنة
وعارفه إني في إيد أمينة حنينة
حبيبي مهما في يوم هشوف مستحملاك
حبيبي ياللي كتير جرحتك وبعيوبي قبلتني
وكنت ياما تقل راحتك و في عيونك شيلتني

english.title: Comfortable
text: I don’t want from you proofs and I do believe you. In every way from the ways, I will stay with you. I believe what you had done for me and what will you will also do. I believe your fear for me that you don’t act it.
And for that, what ever happens, I am comfortable and I know that I am in a honest hands, tender hands.

Baby, as much as I will see from you, I will stand still. I will carry with you the worst circumstances and I will make you stronger. Baby, I did hurt you a lot and in my flaws you accepted me. And you were always tiring yourself and in your eyes you carried me.

english.title: half of the world
text: i am not only sb for continuation and i am not a zero at the left
about my role during hard time lots of things was spoken
i am simply half of the world
i dont need to prove that my presence is important
before all of that is enough for me
there is a place in paradise beacause i am a mother
i am not a speech on the paper or i am not sth not considered
when the universe was created there was a written role for me
my hands build and dont destroy, i am standing inside during serious time
i know my right and i know my duty and nobody is better than the others

arabic.title: هاتمناله الخير
text: كان عمرى و كان هو زمانى
كان قلبى و روحى و عنيا
هافتكرله حاجات كتير كانت ما بينا
هافتكرله حاجات كتير كانت ما بينا
لما كنا بنقسم الفرحه فى عيوننا
ده نا هاتمنى تلف الدنيا تانى

english.title: Hatmannalo al-khayr
text: I'll wish him good... what does it mean, that he leave me and forget me
Oh he bore alot because of me, Oh he was always worried about me
I'll wish him good... before he hurts me, he has cured me
He was my life and my time... he was my heart, my soul and my eyes
I'll recall many things that were between us
I'll recall.. our love days... and the steps in our way
when we used to share the happiness in our eyes
I'll recall many things about him... I'll wish him good
I'll wish him good from my heart... because he deserves
I'll wish that life would restart and we meet again

arabic.title: هدنة
text: بلاش بالشكل ده نمشي طريق العمر لنهايته
ويفضل كل واحد فينا حاسس إن شئ فايته
كل واحد فينا قلبه يكون وحيد
تبقى فرصة نداوي روحنا من جروحنا
أو نشوف الصورة أوضح من بعيد
جميل في عينيك و في عينيا

english.title: A truce
text: Let us not walk the path of our life to the end the way we do
While each of us is feeling that something is missing
We have been bound by love once, but now
We treat each other like enemies
The voice of reason tells us to move on
But there is something inside us calls us
To keep a distance for sometime and think it over
So that we can calmly decide
Consider it as if we had a truce from our vows
So, the heart of each of us will be alone
It would be an opportunity for us to heal the wounds in our souls
And to see the whole picture better from a distance
"I love you". Don't you believe these words?
Because I lost the feeling of saying them
I always run from your arms
Because you feel stranger to me
The safest thing to do now
Is to go away for sometime
Like that we will be either combined back again, thanks to parting
Which would lead you back to me
Or we will be separated forever. And what we once had
Will live forever, wonderful in our eyes

arabic.title: يا ريتك فاهمني
text: يا ريتك فاهمني بجد زي ما بفهمك
وتقرا اللي جوايا أما عيني تبصلك
يا حلمي اللي متأجل وأنا هاموت و أحلمك
يا عمري اللي ناقص عمر نفسي أكملك
يا كل الكلام اللي بشفايفي بهمسه
يا أملي اللي بتمناه أطوله او ألمسه
يا هوا من زمان عايشة عشان بتنفسه
ياريت أبقى اخرك في الحياة دي و أولك
لو اختار  ما بين نفسي وما بينك هاعترف
بإن انت أغلى و أولى وكمان أولاً
بحبك سنين في السر وماحدش عرف
وأنا أدفع سنين تانيين وأحبك في العلن
عينيك ألف رحلة وفيها خدت على السفر
يا ليل قد عمري نفسي يطول و أسهره
يا ذنب في حياتي اللي لو بكره اتغفر
بقية حياتي هعيده و أفضل أكرره

english.title: I Wish You'd Understand Me
text: I wish you'd really understand me like I understand you
and read my mind when I look at you
you're a dream that I've been putting off, I might die while you're still just a dream
you're my life that's missing a life, I wish I could complete you
you're all the words on my lips that I whisper
you're the wish that I wish I could reach out to or touch
you're the air that's been keeping me alive
I wish I could be your last and first
if I had to choose between me and you, I will confess
that you're more precious than me, you have the priority and you're first
I've been in love with you secretly for years and no one knew
and I'm paying more years and loving you in the open
your eyes are a thousand trip and I've gotten used to travel in them
you're a night as long as my lifetime that I wish it gets longer so I can stay awake
you're a sin in my life that if it shall be forgiven tomorrow
I will spend the rest of my life doing it all over and time and time again

arabic.title: كل الكلام
text: حبيبي انت غاوي دايما تقول كلام
لو الكلام بيداوي ليه حاسه بآلام
ان كان علي العتاب عاتبتك لما دوبت
لا جرح قلبي طاب حبيبي ولا انت توبت
منين بتجيب كلامك كلام جميل بيعجب
خلاني أقول لجرحي يا جرح ليه بتكدب
كدبك غريب واياما خدني لأحلام سعيدة
وأخاف أمشي في طريقي وأرجع منه وحيدة

english.title: All the Words
text: And here we are, we're the same
If we had lived even one happy day
Our wounds would have been worth it
Darling, you always like to say words
If words healed, then why do I feel pain?
When it comes to blame, I've blamed you till I melted
Neither did my heart's wound heal nor did you call it quits
And the tenderness of your words makes me return
And I call my heart's wound a liar and believe your promises
Where do you get your words? Such attractive pretty words
They made me say to my pain: "Oh pain, why are you a liar?"
Your lies are weird and they took me away to happy dreams many times
And I'm scared to walk my path and find myself returning alone
